full_threads.body:
Hi Michael, 

Sure, we have updated the text as requested. Here is the link to review: https://drmichaelstening.com.au/orthopaedic-surgeon/

Also noted regarding the photo. We will wait to hear back from either of you with your preferred photo and any other changes.

Hi Heath,
There are a few more things I would like edited and added to my website. Firstly as of 2019 I will be an examiner for the fellowship exam RACS. This should go into my profile section. Can you please edit such that the last paragraph says" He is actively involved in teaching Orthopaedic trainees having been supervisor of training at both Sydney Childrens and Hawkesbury Hospitals and recently appointed to Royal Australasian College of Surgeons Court of Examiners, the peak examining body of the Australian Orthopaedic Association.
New paragraph. .... " He is current Head of Orthopaedics at St John of God Hawkesbury District Hospital and immediate Past President of the Australian Paediatric Orthopaedic Society"

Also my wife doesn't like the photograph of me on the front page banner (she thinks it looks like I've had a stroke!!) . She likes the one of me sitting at desk though (small mercies). She'll send you a photo from the shoot that she does like to replace. She'll also discuss with you putting a link to Health Share which is a rating website

Thanks again and Merry Xmas
Regards, Michael

From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ [mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au]
Sent: Wednesday, 12 December 2018 10:30 AM
To: Michael Stening
Subject: Re: Lakeview Private Hospital Logo

Ok sure, thanks Michael.
HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271





On 12 Dec 2018, at 6:57 am, Michael Stening <mstening@optusnet.com.au> wrote:

Hi Heath
Thank you for attending to this at short notice. You will also need to delete any photo that has HSS in it ie picture of building. I’ll forward a new photo with name change to replace later
Regards
Michael

Sent from my iPhone

On 11 Dec 2018, at 7:09 pm, Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:

Hi Janette,

Sure, no worries, we will work on this tomorrow and notify you once it’s done.

Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271





On 11 Dec 2018, at 6:55 pm, Stening <mstening@optusnet.com.au> wrote:

Hi Heath

We have only received this today, so I know it is very short notice but we need all references to HSS removed from the website and replaced by Lakeview Private Hospital.

Also the suburb has been changed to Norwest but otherwise remains the same.

This change is due to a legal case against the name HSS , so we have to comply fully to the obligation to remove any reference to HSS from our website

thank you for your help with this

Kind regards
Janette



From: Rosemary McDonald [mailto:Rosemary.McDonald@lakeviewprivate.com.au]
Sent: Tuesday, 11 December 2018 4:07 PM
Subject: FW: Lakeview Private Hospital Logo



Dear Surgeons,

Tomorrow is the official change over date to Lakeview Private Hospital. Can we please ask for you to remove any references/ photos/ logo of Hospital for Specialist Surgery from your websites as soon as possible. Attached is our new logo pack. The logo should only ever appear in its entirety. In copy, the hospital should only be referred to as ‘Lakeview Private Hospital’, not LPH, LVP, or ‘Lakeview Private’.

We are having some professional photos taken over the next 6 weeks. Once these are finalised, I will provide a drop box link to a gallery of photos you are permitted to use on any of your platforms.

If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to give me a call.

Thanks in advance for your cooperation!

Kind regards,

<image003.jpg>Rosemary McDonald
General Manager
Lakeview Private Hospital|17-19 Solent Circuit Norwest NSW 2153
Tel: 02 8624 5000|Direct: 02 8711 0500
www.lakeviewprivate.com.au


______________________________________________________________________
While this email message has been scanned for the presence of computer viruses,
and Lakeview Private Hospital has taken every reasonable precaution to
minimise the risk from them, we cannot accept liability from same. You should carry
out your own virus checks before opening attachments.
This email and any attachments are confidential and may be privileged or contain
confidential information and is intended only for use of the addressee. Any
unauthorised direct or indirect dissemination, use, disclosure or copying is strictly
prohibited and may be unlawful. Please delete any emails received in error.
Any views, advice or opinions contained in this communication are those of the
individual sender except where the sender specifies and with authority states them
to be the views of Lakeview Private Hospital.
______________________________________________________________________
<Lakeview PH Logo.zip>
